pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Mongo to SomA small library to analyze data from MongoDB with Self Organizing Map### Installation```pip install mongo-to-som```### Get startedHow to use library:```Pythonfrom mongo_to_som import mongotosom# Instantiate a Multiplication objectmongotosom.mongo_to_som(num_rows, num_cols, max_steps, max_m_distance, max_learning_rate, url, port, db, collection)```
